entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @abigailmarone @jaketapper Hey, if Biden was President he'd probably forget there was a pandemic, wouldn't know who to turn to in this crisis& he'd  stare out the white house window waiting 4 someone to tell him what's going on & what he's supposed to do while all hell broke loose. That's terrifying truth.
